title: Why The Hepatitis B Birth Dose Is At Risk From New CDC Vaccine Advisors
description: New members of the CDC vax advisory committee (ACIP) are opposed to newborn Hepatitis B vaccine, believing them not needed for most, and dangerous. Data contradicts that.
content:
A new-born baby lies on a bed after her birth at the maternity ward of a hospital (Photo by CHRISTOPHE ARCHAMBAULT/AFP via Getty Images)
AFP via Getty Images
